entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9607] It is expected that NoncontrollingInterests with a value of -769,000 reported in the network role http://www.imcannabis.com/role/CONSOLIDATEDSTATEMENTSOFFINANCIALPOSITION, http://www.imcannabis.com/role/DISCONTINUEDOPERATIONSANDDECONSOLIDATIONDetails should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 769,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.imcannabis.com/role/CONSOLIDATEDSTATEMENTSOFCHANGESINEQUITY. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : CAD Decimals of NoncontrollingInterests : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 26.0.9 - exhibit_99-2.htm 1630
